column1: Uchi////By far the best sushi ever tasted. Besides great fresh food
column2: the vibe at the restaurant is very inviting but also very hip and cool. The staff from greeters to wait staff to valet parking staff are very welcoming. You should call for a reservation
column3: as this place is very busy. We went when you could order mini plates of different foods which was fantastic. If you are in Houston
column4: Texas definitely delight your palate by eating at Uchi.
